ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.context: root/document[0]/metadata[0](319 0 obj PDMetadata)/XMPPackage[0]
checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: The Metadata stream as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3 in the document catalog dictionary shall contain a dc:title entry

checks.context: root/document[0]/metadata[0](319 0 obj PDMetadata)/XMPPackage[0]
checks.errorMessage: Metadata stream does not contain dc:title

ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child. The namespace for that element shall be specified as the PDF 2.0 namespace

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](81 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)
checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains a single Document structure element, but this element is not within the PDF 2.0 namespace (namespace URI = http://iso.org/pdf/ssn)

ruleSummaries.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 9.9

checks.context: root/document[0]/pages[1](30 0 obj PDPage)/contentStream[0](31 0 obj PDSemanticContentStream)/operators[116]/font[0](ArialMT)
checks.errorMessage: The font program is not embedded

ruleSummaries.description: A Figure structure element shall have at least one of the following properties: a) an alternate description (Alt property), as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3; b) a replacement text (ActualText property) that represents the content enclosed by the Figure structure element
